infos.value: ...Well, well. Quite impressive.
How many aspire to be samurai of the east?
All those born and raised in this land.
All of them...?
Indeed. Hah hah hah!
Then...
What happens after they become samurai?
You could say...they pursue the life of a samurai until death.
Until death...
Even Sir Owe and Sir Seymore strive to become stronger than they were the day before.
And will do so their entire lives?
That's right.
I am currently a guest of the small kingdom of Leonis.
I was meant to teach the sword, yet all I’ve done is learn. Hah hah hah!
And those who fail to become samurai...?
They leave this place. That or...
...Or what?
You will understand before long.
You look unwilling to wait for answers.
I haven’t the time to wait. So...
Samurai must be patient.
The true test begins now.
Only now...?
Let’s move out.
